name: Guise of Innocence
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
The target creature appears to all other creatures as an innocent creature that can do no wrong for the duration of the spell. Misdeeds are instantly forgiven, and any who express anger at the target become scorned by all others.

Egregious crimes, such as murder or theft of an ancient artifact, cause witnesses to make an Intuition saving throw. On a success, they are no longer affected by the spell. On a failure, they rationalize away the crime. A creature that witnesses two such crimes automatically succeeds on the saving throw.

This spell does not have any effect on creatures immune to being charmed.
